metadata.title: CVE-2023-24809 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: NetHack is a single player dungeon exploration game. Starting with version3.6.2 and prior to version 3.6.7, illegal input to the "C" (call) commandcan cause a buffer overflow and crash the NetHack process. Thisvulnerability may be a security issue for systems that have NetHackinstalled suid/sgid and for shared systems. For all systems, it may resultin a process crash. This issue is resolved in NetHack 3.6.7. There are noknown workarounds.

criterions.comment: nethack package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
